response.original_title: There Will Be Blood - Pics Research Etc For the Making Of
response.overview: Anderson’s portrait of the oil business, and is certainly more captivating than the remainder of the films  contents, which together total a whopping half-hour. “15 Minutes” (of “Pics, Research, Etc.”) juxtaposes a series of period still photos and archival film footage with relevant clips from the film.
response.title: There Will Be Blood - Pics Research Etc For the Making Of
